messages.message: There doesn't seem to be a way to delete files that were uploaded to a published AIHub app. Will this feature be included in the future?

Privacy, probably yes. Currently deleting files is possible in both Converse and Build (pre-published app), but not in published apps.

I'm working on file storage limits for AIHub which has to account for when users delete files. I want to account for the case where users delete files in published apps if this delete feature is planned.

A user should be able to delete their files. GDPR will require this.

cc @Chris
